mapper.insert: insert into cw_attachment (NAME, URL, TYPE, BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_TYPE, STATUS, CARD_SHOW, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, ADDIP, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, UPDATEIP) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardShow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{addip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{updateip,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cw_attachment set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_SHOW = #{cardShow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATETIME = now(), UPDATEIP = #{updateip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, NAME, URL, TYPE, BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_TYPE, STATUS, CARD_SHOW, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, ADDIP, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, UPDATEIP from cw_attachment where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, NAME, URL, TYPE, BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_TYPE, STATUS, CARD_SHOW, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, ADDIP, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, UPDATEIP from cw_attachment
